# My Migraine Diary 痛痛日記
#### 隨時隨地紀錄頭痛，正在持續的頭痛狀態也能即時紀錄，長期之下方便醫生問診，也能從中找出引發自身頭痛的真兇。
---
[![swift-version](https://img.shields.io/badge/swift-5.7.2-brightgreen.svg)](https://github.com/apple/swift)
[![xcode-version](https://img.shields.io/badge/xcode-14.2-brightgreen)](https://developer.apple.com/xcode/)
[![swift-package-manager](https://img.shields.io/badge/SPM-compatible-brightgreen.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://github.com/apple/swift-package-manager)

<p float:"left">
<img src="https://github.com/JubeHuang/My-Migraine-Diary/blob/main/migraine2.jpg" width="700">
<img src="https://github.com/JubeHuang/My-Migraine-Diary/blob/main/migraine3.jpg" width="700">
</p>

### 相關技術
- CoreData 儲存資料
- News API 串接與 Json 格式解析
- UIButton & ScrollView Programmatically
- 實作搜尋過往頭痛紀錄功能
- SPM Third Party – Charts / 實作 Combine Chart
- MVC 架構
- AutoLayout
---
### 功能介紹

</p>
